full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## **About the Tender**

Government of Canada invites interested bidders to submit proposals for the delivery of a brand-new steam turbine power lab system, including a computer and software, to the Royal Military College of Canada (RMCC).

### **Project Overview**

A new steam turbine power lab system with a computer and software to record data will be provided to RMCC. The project falls under the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and aims to support the college's education and research needs.

### **Key Details**

* Project Name: W0114-230003 Steam Turbine (`W0114-230003 Turbine à vapeur`)
* Solicitation Number: WS4273656557
* Publication Date: November 9, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2025
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (`demande de propositions`)

### **Proposal Evaluation Criteria**

The proposals will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### **Bidding Process**

The project uses a competitive bidding approach, and all bids must be submitted electronically. The Ministry of Public Services and Procurement (Canada) recommends that potential bidders consult the attached documents for more information.

### **Important Contacts**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Royal Military College of Canada (RMCC)

### **Attachements**

* Please see the project documentation and requirements on the linked webpage:
  - [Link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17968346?extsite=MTc5NjgzNDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
* Please consult the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time for more information. Modifications have been made to these deadlines.

### **Note**: This project has been cancelled. 

### References
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) (`Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)`)

Please note, the above tender notice was cancelled upon completion. There is no longer any opportunity for bidding.
